item.title: Ionic - Datepicker & Android
item.description: After struggling a bit on how to implement a nice looking datepicker with Ionic, I thought I’d share some details here. After reading a few articles, I was left with two possibilities, using a plugin (there’s a bunch of cordova ones) which would add dependencies and require to code a little, or simply using HTML5 <input type="date" /> which seemed to be nicely supported on most mobile browsers, using the mobile’s native ui.
